DOC.brief_summary: This study aim test clinical sample ( stool serum ) previously collect clinical development HRV vaccine , identify evidence PCV-1 replication and/or immune response PCV-1 vaccinate infant .
DOC.brief_title: Serological Response Porcine Circovirus Type 1 ( PCV-1 ) PCV-1 DNA Stools Infants Following Administration Rotarix™
DOC.detailed_description: Serum stool sample collect 4 clinical trial previously conduct HRV vaccine ( Rotarix™ ) use study .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Subjects enrol previously randomize , doubleblind placebocontrolled study 444563/022 ( NCT00263666 ) , 444563/033 ( NCT00757770 ) , 103477 ( NCT00169455 ) , 104480 ( NCT00137930 ) ; Infants age 6 12 week Dose 1 vaccinate either HRV vaccine placebo ; Infants sufficient residual volume stool sample predetermine time point available ; Infants sufficient residual volume pre post vaccination blood sample available . Exclusion criterion : Not applicable
